title: What would it be like in League if...
body:
Just a little thought I had after looking at other MOBA games, and wanted to share! You make up a rule or stipulation, nothing to crazy, but I thought it would help change your view at the little things. Then you take that rule and apply it to EVERYONE in league, and think about how things like the meta or in general gameplay would change for better or worse!
I'll start:

* What would it be like in League if every champ had 10 less base AD? or 100 less base health!?
* What would it be like in League if every non ultimate ability had it's cooldown increased by 2 seconds? 
* What would it be like in League if every champ started the game with 1000 gold? Or NO gold!?

Just little fun things that we can make a game of, try it out and join me in my crazy thoughts! Try it out, I dare you!

What would it be like in League if the cap on CDR was set to 100%?

Play Karthus. 10% CDR from masteries, ~40% CDR from a full set of scaling runes. Go mid lane, farm up for an Athene's. Farm up for another one. One more. Sit in base and win the game while your team permapushes with perfect impunity... except that they have a Soraka who did the same thing. Whoops.

Play Sion. Flat CDR, just build Fiendish Codexes all game. Go jungle, but don't bother with smite; Q and W are enough. Ganks: Q Q Q Q Q Q Q, an enemy has been slain! Enjoy the permaheals from your mid-lane Soraka, while shuddering at the neverending thunder of endless Karthus ults.
